name: Chronurgy Magic
description: Chronurgists manipulate the flow of time itself, bending fate, delaying effects, and rewriting outcomes.

2.name: Chronal Shift
2.description: You can magically exert limited control over the flow of time around a creature. When a creature you can see makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can force it to reroll and use the new result.

2.name: Temporal Awareness
2.description: You add your Intelligence modifier to your initiative rolls.

6.name: Momentary Stasis
6.description: You can force a creature to make a Constitution saving throw or be restrained in a bubble of temporal energy, becoming incapacitated until the end of your next turn.

10.name: Arcane Abeyance
10.description: You can condense a spell into a mote of energy, allowing another creature to release the spell later without expending a spell slot.

14.name: Convergent Future
14.description: You can decide whether a creatureâ€™s attack roll, saving throw, or ability check succeeds or fails. Using this feature gives you a level of exhaustion.
